testsuite.name: Tests.HomeTest
testsuite.system-out: Clicked on login link entered user name entered password Clicked on login button Clicked on computer button Clicked on Desktops link By default sortby dropdown is selected as Position By default DisplayperPage dropdown is selected as 8 By default view as dropdown is selected as grid Clicked on Expensive computer link By default processor is selected as Medium By default HDD is selected as 320GB By default RAM is selected as 2GB Clicked on Image viewer By default quality should be 1 Clicked on Add to cart button in expensive computer Clicked on Shopping cart link Clicked on country dropdown and selected India Clicked on Terms and condition checkbox Clicked on checkout button Selected New address in billing address dropdown Entered First Name in FirstName textfield Entered Last Name in LastName textfield Entered Email in Email textfield Clicked on country dropdown and selected India Entered City in City textfield Entered Address in Address textfield Entered ZipCode in ZipCode textfield Entered Phone Number in Phone Number textfield Clicked on Continue button in billing address By default shipping address is displayed Clicked on In pickup checkbox Clicked on Continue button in shipping address You will pay by COD message is displayed Clicked on Continue button in Payment Information Page By default order summary is displayed Clicked on Confirm Button in Confirm Order Page Clicked on Continue button in ThankYou Page
